A sermon preached before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor, aldermen and citizens of the city of London, in the parish church of S. Mary le Bow, September 3, 1683 being the day of humiliation for the late dreadfull fire / by William Hopkins ... Hopkins, William, 1647-1700.
[5], 34 p.
Printed for Walter Kettilby ..., London : 1683.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Marginal notes.
